Scripts.OnShow: for bag = 0, NUM_BAG_SLOTS do for slot = 1, GetContainerNumSlots(bag) do local texture, _, locked = GetContainerItemInfo(bag, slot) if texture and not locked then local itemlink = GetContainerItemLink(bag, slot) local itemname, _, quality, _, _, _, _, _, _, _, itemvendorprice = GetItemInfo(itemlink) if quality == 0 and itemvendorprice and itemvendorprice > 0 then UseContainerItem(bag, slot) end end end end
